amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent any permits required under the Clean Air Act for oil and natural gas drilling on the Outer Continental Shelf off the Coast of Oregon.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 112-111 to prohibit any permits issued under the Clean Air Act for oil or natural gas drilling on the Outer Continental Shelf (OCS) off the coast of Oregon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 262 (Roll no. 476).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 262 (Roll no. 476).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Schrader.
